document_data.caption: A map showing Morvar in eastern Durpar on the shore of the Golden Water.
document_data.name: Morvar
document_data.mainbody: '''Morvar''' was a large city in [[Durpar]] in the [[Shining Lands]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography: Morvar was located along the west bank of the [[River Lesh]] where it emptied into the [[Golden Water]] in eastern Durpar near the base of the [[Gryphon Mountains]].
document_data.Description: Morvar was filled with smithies and weaving warehouses. All cotton grown south of the [[Ajmer Forest]] was brought to Morvar for production. Additonally, lumber from the forest made its way here as well.
document_data.Inhabitants: Morvar had of population of 20,000, including the most racially mixed blend of inhabitants in any city of the Shining Lands. The city had strong trade relationships with the [[Ulgarth|Ulgarthian]] city of [[Surbar]] across the Golden Water.
